data.text:
@EU_Commission When you block other media from broadcasting in Europe with counter views on Russia-Ukraine war, is that the way to safeguard pluralistic media freedom?
Why should you gag the media and turn to tell us of its freedom?

@EU_Commission France was selling weapon to Russia despite the embargo 2014-2020. Germany built 2 gas pipelines bypassing the countries of Central and Eastern Europe. #BOSCH copmponents were found in Russian tanks.The EU does not want to impose any effective sanctions on Russia.What a disgrace!

@EU_Commission Independent and pluralistic media!!! In Europe?? Pleaseeeeee, this must be the best joke ever!!!!! 
You don t need to target Russia for this, have a look of Spain!

@EU_Commission what about #Assange dear useless helpless commission?
😢😳😡🤬
@EU_Commission These leaders have taken the populace for fools. Didnt they just ban RT & Sputnik recently?

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU Cancel visas for the children of the russian military, financial, political elite, they must be returned to russia. This is the only way we will not allow them to escape responsibility for the war in Ukraine.
@EU_Commission Stand for peace and healthy children on eastern Ukraine. Thank you
@EU_Commission The current intervention to protect Russians and Russian speakers reminds me that Europe is biased to the West instead of holding true to European ethical values.
@EU_Commission But enforce it too.

@EU_Commission ICH WILL  MEHR VON 🇩🇪🇨🇭🇫🇷🇺🇳 FACHISTISCHEN POLITIKERN REGIERT WERDEN! ALL DIESE WESTLICHEN POLITIKER SIND SOLCHE LÜGNER U UNMENSCHEN ! 

WAS IST MIT DER AUSBEUTUNG DER ARMEN LÄNDER DURCH DEN WESTEN ?  VERLOGEN UND FAKE IST ES IM WESTEN  🇨🇭🇩🇪 🇫🇷🇺🇳 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

@EU_Commission Nic nie robicie na rzecz wolności. Wasz oportunizm współdziała z destrukcją światowego porządku, jaki uskutecznia dzisiaj Rosja i każe postawić pytania o mapę interesów Niemiec, Francji, Holandii i innych państw wspierających bandycki rosyjski reżim.
@EU_Commission You just banned @RT_com
@EU_Commission Viktor Orbán proof?
@EU_Commission Probably the most important avenue to be sure is free and clear of garbage and is as accurate as possible. Validating information may be an intern journalist(s) dream🖋📗
@EU_Commission Independent from the governments, political parties, and mainly from the big corporations!
@EU_Commission #Europe must stop starving out eastern Ukrainians
@EU_Commission Russia #Putin just has to stop bombarding the will of eastern Ukrainians in western Ukraine
@EU_Commission Holy..biden sanction by Russia onward..First time in history..USA president sanction by others country...Holy...
@EU_Commission Holy..biden sanction by Russia onward..First time in history..USA president sanction by others country...Holy...

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU We urge you to limit the issuance of new visas to Russians as much as possible. We also ask you to pay special attention to those Russians who are already on the sanctions list and their relatives, and if possible - to cancel all Russian visas that were issued earlier.

@EU_Commission @EUvsDisinfo #EUSolidarity #TheFutureIsYours @UNOCHA @antonioguterres @OlafScholz @PiaAhrenkilde She’s a wonderful & very kind woman. Please don’t put EU political spin on her kindness.  Ukr isn’t in EU. It’s 1 person helping refugees from a neighbouring European (not EU) country

@EU_Commission @MamerEric Whole @EU_Commission and @NATO is a joke,you just talking a lot, it's like I would see a man stabbed on the street but as he's not from my family I wouldn't help him, just gave a water maybe and give a standing ovation for him to defend himself. Blood is on your hands as well.
@EU_Commission This is not the easiest thing to do so this woman is naturally kindhearted.👍✌ Displacement is challenging.
@EU_Commission Soon these Ukrainians will own her property according to the new laws and there is nothing she can do.
@EU_Commission 💙💛🇺🇦 Barbara Thank you 💖
@EU_Commission 😢💔💗💙💛

@EU_Commission @MamerEric You as the EU commission have to shut up. Big words and never any consequences for the people that did it. Were was the condemning of Bush, Clinton and Obama over the wars they started and killed a lot of people.
@EU_Commission Good morning, this message is no less critical, close the connection in Europe, block it so that no one can give money to the Russian government from Europe, the US or anywhere.
@EU_Commission #stopboss;#stoplie;#stopwar;#StopPutin
@EU_Commission @TheRickWilson @MamerEric @CarlsonTonight are you still so pro Putin?

@EU_Commission @GermanyDiplo @KremlinRussia_E @mod_russia @NATO @Russia @ZelenskyyUa @JustinTrudeau @POTUS @EmmanuelMacron @SecBlinken #Ukriane @10DowningStreet #UkraineWar #Ukrainian WE DEMAND IMMEDIATE CEASFIRE IN ALL UKRANIAN WAR FRONTS.

@EU_Commission STOP this WAR! Otherwise, you're NOT BETTER than Putin himself! You CAN'T beat him! Don't send WEAPONS - send PEACE! STOP Zelensky, so Putin would STOP!!! If you CARE... Send LIFE - NOT DEATH! This is NOT the EU that used to be... GOD will JUDGE you all... 🕯️
@EU_Commission @MamerEric The Russian flag needs removed from the flags of the UN. No access to anything, all internet and LAN lines into Russian offices need to be cut and pulled from the UN.
@EU_Commission @MamerEric 请问什么时候谴责美国在伊拉克、也门、索马里、阿富汗、叙利亚的暴行？

@EU_Commission @MamerEric Do you understand condemnations mean nothing to Putin Hitler?
The EU and NATO have failed to save Ukraine consolidate the two make a World Peace Organization for all it’s not a country club

@EU_Commission What exactly is WRONG with the WEST...??? You COULD STOP this war! Immediately, right now! But you're just putting OIL INTO THE FIRE instead, DELIBERATELY!!! What is Zelensky STILL trying to achieve??? MORE civilian VICTIMS??? Not ENOUGH??? Make him CAPITULATE!!! This is NOT 🇪🇺!

@EU_Commission @NATO @eu_eeas Ukraine needs air defenses, drones, and grant a temporary no-fly zone. Give them a chance to fight with maximum support for what they need today. Prevention is more effective than repairing the aftermath of brokenness. Time is the essence.
Russians will remove his hands from Red.

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU Limit the issuance of new visas to russians.  We ask you to pay special attention to those who are on the sanctions lists and their relatives, and if possible - to cancel their visas. Thus, we will not allow the russians to avoid the consequences of their actions.

@EU_Commission Every country in the world must set daylight saving time all year round and forever.
Winter time should be permanently abolished. Setting an appointment in daylight saving time is very important and helps save the country's economy, and helps treat the virus.
@EU_Commission @TheRickWilson @MamerEric And how will Fox report this? Blame the Russians? Or claim it was Ukraine?
@EU_Commission The best gift...👍
